title: The loathsome couple
description: In pen-and-ink drawings and amusing captions, 31 pages tell of Harold Snodleigh and Mona Gritch, two thoroughly repugnant people. They fall in love and discover that their "life's work" is murdering children. Set in Victorian-type era, inspired by the Moors Murders that rocked 1960s England.
author: Edward Gorey
